thread.title: Deem Announces New Wave Of Major Operators Led By Carey International, Continued Growth Of Next-Generation Cloud And Mobile Network
thread.title_full: Deem Announces New Wave Of Major Operators Led By Carey International, Continued Growth Of Next-Generation Cloud And Mobile Network

author: admin
title: Deem Announces New Wave Of Major Operators Led By Carey International, Continued Growth Of Next-Generation Cloud And Mobile Network
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/2/2015 @ 10:49 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Deem 
SAN FRANCISCO, Oct. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Deem , the leading Commerce-as-a-Service (CaaS) company, today announced its latest wave of leading chauffeured ground transportation operators who have signed agreements with Deem for its new Car Service Cloud and Mobile application. Following the announcement of its groundbreaking partnership with the National Limousine Association (NLA) at the Global Business Travel Association (GBTA) Annual Conference in Orlando, FL in July, Deem has added scores of leading operators to its network. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150504/213490LOGO 
The latest wave of operators is led by Carey International, the world's largest chauffeur transportation company, and includes their Embarque and Carey services. Other major operators that have signed on over the past week include Royal Coachman Worldwide, Town Car International, Pontarelli Companies, London Towncars, Inc., King Limousine & Transportation Service, Premier Transportation Services, Overland Limousine Service, Bennington Limousine, ALLSTAR Transportation, Avanti International Transportation, Country Club Limo, CLT Express, BLS, Premier Transportation Services and more. They join an elite group of operators including EmpireCLS, Music Express, Pure Luxury, Flyte Tyme, Arrow Limousine, Gem Limousine Worldwide, Best Chauffeured and many more. 
"Operators, large and small, have concluded it's best to coalesce around Deem's Network to gain scale, have access to best-in-class cloud and mobile capabilities and grow their businesses," said Patrick Grady, Founder and CEO of Deem. "We are thrilled to have this wave of market leaders on board led by Carey International, the world's largest chauffer transportation company and a world-class organization and brand." 
"Deem brings a unique set of assets and advantages to the ground transportation industry including proven cloud and mobile capabilities and significant intellectual property," said Gary L. Kessler, CEO of Carey International. "As a longtime partner, we look forward to connecting to Deem's cloud and mobile services as a key part of our broader distribution strategy." 
Deem continues to leverage its $200 million investment in its one-of-a-kind cloud and mobile platform to deliver a highly-scalable real-time network and mobile application to the chauffeured transportation industry, effectively leveling the technology playing field against the new class of transportation network companies (TNCs). Deem Car Service Cloud and Mobile will allow operators around the world to focus on their longstanding core strength of delivering the safest and highest quality ground service while corporations will be able to combine Duty-of-Care with savings and business travelers and consumers will enjoy world-class convenience, safety and service. 
Companies can manage their corporate chauffeured transportation programs by using Deem Car Service as a standalone application or pairing it with Deem Travel, Deem Expense or the complete Deem suite to unlock the full savings potential of spend and expense management on the Deem platform. By combining user preferences, corporate policies and the negotiated rates between corporations and their preferred operators, all in a consumer-grade cloud and mobile experience, Deem Car Service will enable the perfect transaction for all stakeholders. In addition, users can create both business and personal profiles and seamlessly navigate between each to book advanced and real-time reservations for both business and leisure trips. 
About Deem 
Deem is a leading Commerce-as-a-Service (CaaS) company that connects a large and diverse ecosystem of more than 34,000 customers, 100,000 merchants, 11 million unique products and services and 40 channel partners across a one-of-a-kind business commerce network, enabling them to lower costs, increase revenue and deepen customer loyalty. Deem is backed by leading mutual fund and private equity investors. For more information visit www.deem.com .
